item.description:
We have never done this event, but have always wanted to. The Museum of Fine Art does this the first Friday of every month. They open up one of their galleries, have a live band, cash bar and a tapas menu. Here is the description from the website:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Special Events
mfafirstfridays
5:30 — 9:30 pm
Friday, November 7, 2008
Koch Gallery

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and a delicious tapas menu. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambience with friends both old and new.

mfafirstfridays musical lineup for 2008:
December 5 – The Bill Duffy Jazz Trio

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sounds like the dress is business casual. Free to MFA members, admission cost for non-members ($17). Must be 21 or over.

Let's plan to meet at the ticket counter by the main entrance. Call or text one of us if you can't find us. Brad - 617-780-1627. Corinne - 617-780-1329.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the ticket counter, at the main entrance.
item.name: First Friday at MFA
